      Methods in checkers with parameters of type Move 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Playfield.executeMove(Move m)
      By calling this method a speficic move will be executed on the playfield.
      private void GameLogic.incrementTurnCounter(Move m)
      This method increments one of the global variables moveCount, after a turn was finished.
      void GameLogic.makeMove(Move m)
      First, the method tests, if the Move transferred as a parameter is valid.
      boolean GameLogic.testMove(Move move)
      This method is the non static version of testMove.
      static boolean GameLogic.testMove(Move m, Playfield f)
      It tests if the given move is possible on the given playfield.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Moves.addMove(Move m)
      This method writes a distinct move, represented by a move object, as a String, into global text area.
      private void PlayfieldPanel.resetAndExecute(Move m)
      After the buttons were clicked and a valid move could be created, all included variables are reseted and the move is passed to the Gamelogic.
